title: Tethered fly pipeline parameters
description: This pipeline uses Nextflow and processes videos of tethered flies using APT to produce tracking output.

i.description: Top level directory for experiment containing all individual fly subdirectories

o.description: Directory where final results `.trk`, `_3dres.mat` will be generated. The per fly and per video results will be generated in the corresponding subfolders as found in the input, e.g., `.../fly4315/C001H001S0002/C001H001S0002_c.trk`

tmp_tracking_dir.description: Directory containing the intermediate results generated during the `detect` step

body_axis_lookup_filename.description: .csv file containting fly numbers with the corresponding body axis .lbl files e.g. `/groups/huston/hustonlab/flp-chrimson_experiments/fly2BodyAxis_lookupTable_Ben.csv` | | --label_filename | `/groups/branson/bransonlab/apt/experiments/data/sh_trn5017_20200121_stripped.lbl`

calibrations_filename.description: .csv file containing fly numbers with the corresponding calibration files

flydata_dirname_pattern.description: Regex pattern for selecting the fly directories. This can be used for running the pipeline only for one or two flies for example: `fly123[4,8]` - selects only `fly1234` and `fly1238` as inputs. Default: `fly[0-9]*`

sideview_videoname_pattern.description: Filename pattern for **SIDE** view videos. Changing this may require settting `frontview_videoname_pattern` so that we process the side and front view in pairs. Default: `C001*.avi`

frontview_videoname_pattern.description: Filename pattern for **FRONT** view videos. Changing this may require settting `sideview_videoname_pattern` so that we process the side and front view in pairs.  Default: `C002*.avi`

sideview_crop_size.description: Default crop size used for **SIDE** view. **Only change this if you know how this impacts the algorithm.** Default: `230,350`

frontview_crop_size.description: Default crop size used for **FRONT** view. **Only change this if you know how this impacts the algorithm.**  Default: `350,350`

sideview_detect_result_suffix.description: Filename suffix used for **SIDE** view intermediated results. Default: `_side`

frontview_detect_result_suffix.description: Filename suffix used for **FRONT** view intermediate results. Default: `_front`
